ygData.subject: Uh, oh......
ygData.msgSnippet: (Thanks to all who wished me well. I m alright now, but I hardly got sleep yesterday or the day before. It sucked.) Fliq and Brix were just out of the sector,

(Thanks to all who wished me well. I'm alright now, but I hardly got 
sleep yesterday or the day before. It sucked.)


Fliq and Brix were just out of the sector, when they heard the gun 
fire.

"The Ark! It's under attack!!!"

They Maximized at took the quick journey back. As soon as they were 
there, Fliq was all ready for battle.

"Look, there's a bot doing nothing. I'll take him."(Oinker)

Fliq blasted off into the air and aimed right at Oinker. He blasted 8 
plasma shots from his mounted cannons right at him.

Bronco looked for something to do. He looked over by the Ark, and saw 
an unconscious bot. When he ran over, it turned out to be Spears! He 
picked her up and brought her into the Ark,  needing to find a CR 
Chamber. He headed for the bringe, thinking maybe there was one 
there. When he got there he saw another bot(Rodius Prime) was already 
in there. Than he saw something more interesting. A bomb(5....)

He dropped Spears outside the bridge and than ran in to wake up the 
bot in the chamber.(4....)He was a warrior. He didn't know what 
buttons to press. All he knew was that he had to get rid of the bomb.
(3....). He carefully picked it up, as not to set it off. He saw a 
window that was already broken.(2....) He got ready to throw, and.....

(Will Bronco and the bot in the chamber get out of this catastrophe? 
Tine in next time, same Beast Wars Time, same Beast Wars Chanel.)
